description: This survey of Russian culture and civilization uses original Russian texts on history, the arts, religion and education, as well as documentary films and selections from literature. The course fosters the acquisition of the language of Russian cultural and intellectual discourse. Prerequisite: Russian 251 or special permission of the instructor.
name: Russ Culture & Civ
prerequisites: Russian 251 or special permission of the instructor.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Russian 251 or special permission of the instructor.

title: Russian Culture and Civilization
